模块 application.project4_pizzaordermanager
程序包 application.project4_pizzaordermanager

类 MainController

java.lang.Object
application.project4_pizzaordermanager.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Main Controller that handles ordering functions. Handles pizza selection, customer phone number verification, and order manipulation.
作者:
Yuchen Wei, Denghao Sun

  • 方法详细资料

    • getPizza

      protected Pizza getPizza()
      Share pizza data to other controllers.
      返回:
      the default pizza of the type selected.

    • getPizzaName

      protected String getPizzaName()
      Share pizza's name data to other controllers.
      返回:
      pizza's of the type selected.

    • getPhoneNumber

      protected String getPhoneNumber()
      Share customer's phone humber to other controllers.
      返回:
      customer's phone number.

    • getPizzaImage

      protected javafx.scene.image.Image getPizzaImage()
      Share the image of the pizza selected to other controllers.
      返回:
      the image of the pizza selected.

    • getOrder

      protected Order getOrder()
      Share the current order data to other controllers.
      返回:
      the current order.

    • getPlaceOrders

      protected ArrayList<Order> getPlaceOrders()
      Share the placed order list to other controllers.
      返回:
      the placed order list.

    • placeOrder

      protected boolean placeOrder(Order order)
      Place order to the order list.
      参数:
      order - to be placed.
      返回:
      true if successfully placed, false if the order already exists in the list.

    • checkPhoneNumber

      private boolean checkPhoneNumber(String number)
      Check if the phone number input is valid. Only non-empty and integer parsable string is allowed.
      参数:
      number - string input to be checked.
      返回:
      true if the number is valid, false otherwise.

    • checkNewOrder

      private boolean checkNewOrder(String number)
      Check if a new order is needed to be created.
      参数:
      number - input to be checked.
      返回:
      true if a different number is entered, false otherwise.

    • onPizzaButton

      protected void onPizzaButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Create an instance of pizza according to the type of pizza button pressed and start customizing. Open up the window for customization.
      参数:
      event - expected to be a button pressing event.
      抛出:
      IOException - for IO Exception.

    • onCurrentOrder

      protected void onCurrentOrder() throws IOException
      Open up the window for manipulating the current order.
      抛出:
      IOException - when the fxml file is not found.

    • onStoreOrder

      protected void onStoreOrder() throws IOException
      Open up the window for manipulating the order list.
      抛出:
      IOException - when the fxml file is not found.
